com.github.katjahahn.tools.sigscanner

Class Jar2ExeScanner

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.katjahahn.tools.sigscanner.Jar2ExeScanner

  • public class Jar2ExeScanner
extends java.lang.Object
    A scanner for Wrappers of Jar to Exe converters. The class provides methods for finding indicators about the tools used to wrap the jar, finding possible locations of the embedded jar file and may assist in dumping it.

      • getZipAddresses

        public java.util.List<java.lang.Long> getZipAddresses()
        Determines the offset of the beginning of zip/jar archives within the file.

        It uses the PK ZIP magic number to determine possible addresses and starts to read for entries there. If there is at least one entry found, the address is returned.

        Returns:
        a list of addresses where a zip/jar with entries was found

      • getPossibleClassAddresses

        public java.util.List<java.lang.Long> getPossibleClassAddresses()
        Returns offsets of the file where the 0xCAFEBABE magic number for Java .class files was found. You may try to dump these files.

        Returns:
        a list of addresses that might be the beginning of an embedded jar

      • dumpAt

        public void dumpAt(long addr,
          java.io.File dest)
        Dumps the part of PE file starting at the given address to the given destination path.

        Parameters:
        addr - the address to start dumping the file from
        dest - the location to save the dump to
